title: AMBERSTAR AMBERMOON ALBION (Templayer&Illidan)
description:
EMULATORS PROVIDED

This is a pack of RPG games from Thalion
(and some from Blue Byte respectively, because 
some people went to them after Thalion declared
bankruptcy)


The Original Trilogy -
1. Amberstar (AMIGA)
2. Ambermoon (AMIGA)
3. Albion (PC DOS and WINDOWS)

Another RPG game -
Dragonflight (AMIGA)

Another, but this time a pseudoRPG game -
Chambers of the Shaolin (AMIGA)

Games created for the AMIGA system do not normally
run on Windows. You have to use an AMIGA emulator.
Same thing for the DOS game. Albion is available in both
the original DOS version, and the Windows port. If you
cannot run the Windows version, emulate the DOS one
with the emulator provided.

To play Ambermoon properly you have to read the 
list of glitches (and how to get around them)

Emulator walkthroughs -
Amiga -
Dos - http://old-cans.com/dosbox/en/

Compiled by Templayer and Illidan.

Web: www.Templayer.707.cz
Youtube: www.youtube.cz/Templayer
Email:   
Soundtracks: can be found in na
Wiki: http://31.31.77.202/albion.html
